attributes.action: Reintroduce Capital Punishment in the UK
attributes.additional_details: The government needs to introduce this as a deterrent to people. Life in luxury prisons in not a suitable punishment for such evil and callous crimes.
attributes.background: The government to reintroduce Capital Punishment for premeditated, callous, evil crimes such as child torture leading to death.

rejection.details:
We have published the following petitions, which you might like to sign:

Bring back the death penalty for convicted murderers: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/601972

Bring back the death penalty for sexual abuse against children: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/593534

Hold a referendum on whether to reinstate the death penalty: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/602435
